Description:
Detects process access requests to LSASS process with potentially suspicious access flags

Author: Florian Roth, Roberto Rodriguez, Dimitrios Slamaris, Mark Russinovich, Thomas Patzke, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Sherif Eldeeb, James Dickenson, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious GrantedAccess Flags On LSASS
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (((granted_access="*30" OR granted_access="*50" OR granted_access="*70" OR granted_access="*90" OR granted_access="*B0" OR granted_access="*D0" OR granted_access="*F0" OR granted_access="*18" OR granted_access="*38" OR granted_access="*58" OR granted_access="*78" OR granted_access="*98" OR granted_access="*B8" OR granted_access="*D8" OR granted_access="*F8" OR granted_access="*1A" OR granted_access="*3A" OR granted_access="*5A" OR granted_access="*7A" OR granted_access="*9A" OR granted_access="*BA" OR granted_access="*DA" OR granted_access="*FA" OR granted_access="*0x14C2") (granted_access="0x100000*" OR granted_access="0x1418*" OR granted_access="0x1438*" OR granted_access="0x143a*" OR granted_access="0x1f0fff*" OR granted_access="0x1f1fff*" OR granted_access="0x1f2fff*" OR granted_access="0x1f3fff*" OR granted_access="0x40*")) dst_process_path="*\\lsass.exe") NOT ((process_path="*:\\Program Files (x86)\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Program Files\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*") OR (process_path="*:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\*" process_path="*\\MsMpEng.exe") OR ((call_trace="*|?:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Definition Updates\\{*" call_trace="*}\\mpengine.dll+*") granted_access="0x1418") OR (call_trace="*|c:\\program files\\windows defender\\mprtp.dll*" OR call_trace="*|c:\\program files\\windows defender\\MpClient.dll*") OR (process_path="*\\explorer.exe" granted_access="0x401")) NOT ((process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\WebEx\\WebexHost.exe" granted_access="0x401") OR process_path="*\\SteamLibrary\\steamapps\\*" OR ((process_path="*\\aurora-agent-64.exe" OR process_path="*\\aurora-agent.exe" OR process_path="*\\thor.exe" OR process_path="*\\thor64.exe") granted_access="0x40") OR process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Microsoft VS Code\\Code.exe" OR (process_path="*\\MBAMInstallerService.exe" granted_access="0x40") OR (process_path="*:\\ProgramData\\VMware\\VMware Tools\\*" process_path="*\\vmtoolsd.exe") OR ((process_path="*\\PROCEXP64.EXE" OR process_path="*\\PROCEXP.EXE") granted_access="0x40") OR ((process_path="*\\handle.exe" OR process_path="*\\handle64.exe") granted_access="0x40") OR process_path="*:\\ProgramData\\MALWAREBYTES\\MBAMSERVICE\\ctlrupdate\\mbupdatr.exe")
